Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2018 02:13PM RT123 wrote: That's a hard call to make. Is the lump in the same breast as the one you had treatment on? It's good you went and got an ultrasound on the area earlier this summer. Because of that I think it would be okay to wait another two weeks. But it is completely your call.
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Mariett Falconer

Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2018 01:47PM - edited Sep 28, 2018 01:47PM by RT123 I agree, I would ask the doctor if it was atypical or normal as well. Also, address your concern about the wrong mass being biopsied. It never hurts to clarify, especially if it's playing on your mind.
